current_company.title: SDE @Kotak Mahindra Bank | Sponsorship Manager, Inter IIT Tech-Meet 10.0 | IIT Kgp'23

experience.title: Digital Intern
experience.description: Project:Extraction of text data from medical claim forms• Created an end to end model capable of making bounding boxes for identifying certain text blocks in claim forms, using YOLO algorithm• Performed benchmarking tests between the object detection models YOLO, fast RCNN and faster RCNN to provide better background for the selection of models for object detection, achieving a decrease in the latency of the model from 4 sec to 50 milisec (1/80 times)• Worked on removing noise from claim form images with the help of noise filtering algorithms Weiner Filter, Mean filter & guassian filter• Explored and prepared documentation for the use of TableNet and Cascade TabNet to extract tabular data from the claim form images• Successfully deployed a tesseract based text extraction model which could identify handwritten and text data from the bounding boxes• Achieved a decrease in latency of 6 sec in the text detection and extraction model, making it commercially usable for forms processing
experience.description_html: Project:Extraction of text data from medical claim forms• Created an end to end model capable of making bounding boxes for identifying certain text blocks in claim forms, using YOLO algorithm• Performed benchmarking tests between the object detection models YOLO, fast RCNN and faster RCNN to provide better background for the selection of models for object detection, achieving a decrease in the latency of the model from 4 sec to 50 milisec (1/80 times)• Worked on removing noise from claim form images with the help of noise filtering algorithms Weiner Filter, Mean filter & guassian filter• Explored and prepared documentation for the use of TableNet and Cascade TabNet to extract tabular data from the claim form images• Successfully deployed a tesseract based text extraction model which could identify handwritten and text data from the bounding boxes• Achieved a decrease in latency of 6 sec in the text detection and extraction model, making it commercially usable for forms processing

experience.title: New Initiatives Intern
experience.description: • Formulated market and competitor analysis report, & translated data into strategical insights on product positioning & operations• Worked on the Ideation and implementation of the corporate insurance plan, leveraging the services offered uniquely by the company• Worked directly with general customers and corporate clients to identify unrecognized pain points in the Healthcare insurance industry
experience.description_html: • Formulated market and competitor analysis report, & translated data into strategical insights on product positioning & operations• Worked on the Ideation and implementation of the corporate insurance plan, leveraging the services offered uniquely by the company• Worked directly with general customers and corporate clients to identify unrecognized pain points in the Healthcare insurance industry <!---->

experience.title: Sponsorship Manager
experience.description: • Forged associations worth, INR 15 lakhs, with major corporate giants and organizations like BOSCH, Mercari Japan, ISRO and DRDO. • Mentored a team of 3 associate managers to garner sponsorship, forge and maintain associations with multi-national corporations. • Planned and designed the working structure and timelines for the Sponsorship team, streamlining the sponsorship process.
experience.description_html: • Forged associations worth, INR 15 lakhs, with major corporate giants and organizations like BOSCH, Mercari Japan, ISRO and DRDO. • Mentored a team of 3 associate managers to garner sponsorship, forge and maintain associations with multi-national corporations. • Planned and designed the working structure and timelines for the Sponsorship team, streamlining the sponsorship process. <!---->

positions.subtitle: Kshitij, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: • Led a team of 5 members to forge and maintain corporate relations with Multinational Corporations• Planned, Ideated, and executed the first-ever online edition of Kshitij in a team of 15 heads leading 40 Core Team Members• Forged associations, worth INR 10.5 Lacs, with corporate giants like Line Corporation, Siemens, McAfee as sponsors of Kshitij 2021• Ideated and orchestrated the first-ever Virtual Technology Summit with 11 technologists from companies like Mercedes-Benz• Facilitated the Guest Lecture Series for Kshitij 2021, with Mr. Nitesh Tiwari, Ms. Dipa Karmakar,Mr. Pratik Gandhi and many others

experience.title: Data Analyst Intern
experience.description: • Applied Ensemble Algorithms to predict the quarterly income of farmers on the basis of the data from the past 5 years• Analyzed the effect of interventions by CINI on more than 3 Lakh households spread across Gujrat, Jharkhand, Odisha and Maharashtra• Performed pre - processing and Feature Engineering on real-life datasets with more than 100 features from over 1000 households• Found synergies between agricultural and non-agricultural activities and income levels of farmers in rural households using matplotlib
experience.description_html: • Applied Ensemble Algorithms to predict the quarterly income of farmers on the basis of the data from the past 5 years• Analyzed the effect of interventions by CINI on more than 3 Lakh households spread across Gujrat, Jharkhand, Odisha and Maharashtra• Performed pre - processing and Feature Engineering on real-life datasets with more than 100 features from over 1000 households• Found synergies between agricultural and non-agricultural activities and income levels of farmers in rural households using matplotlib
